articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Visits Greenhouses under Construction in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Visits Greenhouses under Construction in Pyongyang
						

					Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim inspected greenhouses under construction of the Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute and the Pyongyang Floriculture Institute on Wednesday to learn about their situation.
					
					 After going round those greenhouses being built on a modern basis under the plan of leader Kim Jong Il, the premier convened a consultative meeting of officials concerned. 
					
					 The meeting dealt with detailed measures to raise the quality of buildings and the speed of their construction and ensure smooth provision of supplies needed for construction by relevant units.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets ITTF President
articles.content:
Vice-President of SPA Presidium Meets ITTF President
						

					 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Adam Sharara, president of the International Table Tennis Federation, and his companion at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday when they paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: ITTF President Tours Various Places of Pyongyang
articles.content:
ITTF President Tours Various Places of Pyongyang
						

					 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Adam Sharara, president of the International Table Tennis Federation, and his companion, visited Mangyongdae Revolutionary Musuem on Thursday.
					
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary life of President Kim Il Sung and the undying feats of members of the Mangyongdae family, the guests went round the historic relics and data on display there.
					
					 They toured the Tower of the Juche Idea and the Table-Tennis Gymnasium in Chongchun Street, etc. and appreciated the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang".
